pages.text: Rituals allow to summon spirits into our plane of existence, or bind them into objects or living beings. Every ritual consists of a $(thing)pentacle$(), $(thing)ritual ingredients$() provided via sacrificial bowls, a $(thing)starting item$() and optionally the $(thing)sacrifice$() of living beings.$(br2)A purple particle effect will show that the ritual is successful and in progress.

pages.title: Performing a ritual
pages.text: Rituals always follow the same steps: $(br)$(li)Draw the pentacle. $(li)Place a golden bowl. $(li)Place sacrificial bowls.$(li)Put ingredients in bowls.$(li)Right-click the golden bowl with the activation item.$(li)$(italic)Optional: Perform a sacrifice close to the center of the pentacle.$()$(br2)
